# Carson Farmer

> Personal link-in-bio site for Carson Farmer â€” CTO & Cofounder at Recall Labs,  building Recall Network, an onchain intelligence network for billions of AI agents.

Carson is a former professor/academic turned builder, working on distributed systems,  data structures, blockchain, and AI/machine-learning. Canadian, based in Boulder, CO.

## Links

- [calendar link](https://calendar.app.google/AHiwWmnMeeXH9eMP6): carson's personal calendar
- [recall labs](https://linktr.ee/recalllabs): accelerating agentic intelligence.
- [recall network](https://recall.network): onchain intelligence network for billions of AI agents.
- [recent paper: geometric search trees](https://g-trees.github.io/g_trees/): a family of randomized, history-independent search tree data structures.
